com.esri.mo2.client.io
Class EsrimapOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.OutputStream
        |
        +--java.io.FilterOutputStream
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.client.io.EsrimapOutputStream
public class EsrimapOutputStream
extends FilterOutputStream

This class implements methods to support an authenticated output stream. This output stream can be accessed just like a standard java I/O stream.
